root.description:
Attempts to activate the ability that is passed in. This will check costs and requirements before doing so.
It differs from GAS ASC TryActivateAbilityByClass by also returning the ActivatedAbility as an output parameter, if it thinks it activated.

param.name: Ability to Activate
param.description: The Gameplay Ability Class to activate

param.name: Allow Remote Activation
param.description: If true, it will remotely activate local/server abilities, if false it will only try to locally activate abilities.

param.name: Activated Ability
param.description: The Gameplay Ability that was triggered on success

param.name: Return Value
param.description: bSuccess Returns true if it thinks it activated, but it may return false positives due to failure later in activation.
